Set the resolution of a vsphere virtual machine

hostname.description: The hostname or address to use to connect

port.description: The port to use to connect

protocol.description: The protocol to use to connect, such as rdp, ssh, etc

username.description:
The optional username to use to connect
If omitted, the user will be prompted on connection
Note: This must be set to connect to a Windows machine using Network Level Authentication

password.description:
The optional password to use to connect
If omitted, the user will be prompted on connection
Note: This must be set to connect to a Windows machine using Network Level Authentication

userId.description: Id of the Vm's owner if it is a personal Vm

allowedNetworks.description: A list of networks that a regular user can access

ipAddresses.description: A list of IP addresses of the Vm

teamIds.description: The Ids of the Team's the Vm is a part of

hasPendingTasks.description: True if this Vm currently has pending tasks (power on, power off, etc)

VmUsageLoggingSession.description: A Logging session for Virtual Machines

activeVmId.description: Id of the Vm this User is currently viewing, if any
